title: Homemade puff pastry sausage rolls
description: Making puff pastry is a labour of love, but the flaky, buttery result is such a treat. You can't beat sausage rolls made with homemade pastry.
ingredients: 550g/1lb 4oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
550g/1lb 4oz unsalted butter, soft enough to be pliable
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
egg wash (1 free-range egg, lightly beaten in a bowl)
